name: esquenta.v2
description: Versao NODE do aplicativo de controle de boteco: Esquenta

scripts.rebase: sequelize db:drop esquenta_dev; sequelize db:create esquenta_dev; sequelize db:migrate; sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.rebase:sqlite: rm esquenta_dev.sqlite ; sequelize db:migrate; sequelize db:seed:all
